articles.title: Thousands evacuated as wildfires rage out of control in Spain and France - Independent.ie
articles.description: Firefighters battled wildfires raging out of control in Spain and France, including one whose flames reached two popular Atlantic beaches on Sunday, as Europe wilted under an unusually extreme heatwave.

articles.title: Europe heat wave: Historic heat grips UK, France as wildfires rage elsewhere - Axios
articles.description: The forecast for the U.K. is unprecedented, while punishing heat is in store for Plains and West.

articles.title: Heatwave-related deaths soar in Europe - PerthNow
articles.description: Authorities say heat-related deaths have soared in Europe as many nations battle wildfires and experience extreme hot temperatures.

articles.title: Fierce wildfires force thousands in southwestern France to flee homes - CBC News
articles.description: Wildfires raged in southwestern France and Spain on Saturday, forcing thousands of people from their homes as blistering summer temperatures put authorities on alert in parts of Europe.
